# rtx_vlan (Resource)

Manages VLAN interfaces on RTX routers. VLANs enable network segmentation using 802.1Q tagging on LAN interfaces.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface` (String) The parent interface (e.g., 'lan1', 'lan2')
- `vlan_id` (Number) The VLAN ID (2-4094). VLAN 1 is reserved as the default native VLAN.

### Optional

- `ip_address` (String) IP address for the VLAN interface
- `ip_mask` (String) Subnet mask for the VLAN interface (required if ip_address is set)
- `name` (String) VLAN name/description
- `shutdown` (Boolean) Administrative shutdown state (true = disabled, false = enabled)

### Read-Only

- `vlan_interface` (String) The computed VLAN interface name (e.g., 'lan1/1')
